group_1.narration: *Clonk*
—Himena—@Then, even though you became a Magical Girl,@nothing changed for you in class?
—Shigure—@Yeah...
—Shigure—@I had a classmate like you, Himena, whom I saved@from a Witch, but it didn't change anything...
—Shigure—@I've always been in the corner of the class, somewhere in@the background, being talked about behind my back.
—Shigure—@Even though I'm protecting everyone,@no one ever says a word about how amazing that is...
—Himena—@So, you wanted to spread the word about Magical Girl supremacy@so people would understand how awesome you are.
—Shigure—@Yeah...@There's that, and...
—Shigure—@I think people will stop making fun of me@for enjoying being alone...
—Himena—@You too, Hagurin?
—Hagumu—@I get mocked for my personality...
—Hagumu—@I'm always making mistakes,@and people are always laughing at me...
—Hagumu—@But even so, I still protect everyone.
—Hagumu—@If people knew that,@maybe they wouldn’t laugh at me so much...
—Hagumu—@That's when I heard about the ideology of Magical Girl supremacy@from Lady Touka and Lady Nemu.
—Hagumu—@I figured if I could spread the word,@I could prove my worth...
—Himena—@And that's the real beginning of the Neo-Magius.
—Himena—@*Giggle*...I'm feeling all mushy!@Don't you girls feel like we're all SO buddy-buddy now?
—Hagumu—@I still don't feel that way.@So next, you tell us about yourself.
—Shigure—@Yeah, why are you so interested in@the Neo-Magius and Magical Girl supremacy?
—Shigure—@And about your boyfriend...
—Himena—@You're right, it'd be awfully cold of cute lil' me@to hog all the excitement.
—Himena—@...
—Himena—@To be real with you, the only reason I'm interested@is because I want to love freely.
—Hagumu—@Love freely?
—Himena—@Well, me and my BF Hiko are childhood friends,@but our characters are total opposites.
—Himena—@I was one of the girls who stood out the most in my grade,@and I enjoyed being a part of the group.
—Himena—@But Hiko was more of a complete loner@who didn't really fit in.
—Himena—@So, it was so-called "star-crossed love"?@Something like that.
—Himena—@I've loved the brainy Hiko since I was little.
—Himena—@We started dating in secret...
—Himena—@Of course, when I became his girlfriend,@I tried to support him...
—Himena—@But, unlike now, when I didn't have Hiko,@I wasn't all that bright...
—Himena—@Everything I did went wrong...
—Himena—@When I tried to support him, everyone started@looking at me coldly, and I got scared...
—Himena—@Hiko didn't want to be defended either,@so we kept our relationship a secret...
—Himena—@But, I wasn't able to hide it...
—Himena—@And then...
—Shigure—@...
—Himena—@Since Hiko didn't say anything,@I didn't notice...
—Himena—@I mean, I should've known...
—Himena—@After that...
—Hagumu—@...
—Himena—@...after that...he, you know...
—Shigure—@You don't have to say it...
—Himena—@Hiko only exists inside of me now...
—Himena—@*Hic* Sorry...
—Shigure—@No... Now I understand why you said@you'd never betray us...
—Hagumu—@Yeah, we understand.@Don't force yourself...
—Himena—@I want to aim for the real top...
—Himena—@I want the [textYellow:Kimochi] stones.@I want the Automatic Purification System.
—Himena—@I want to become an existence that even Magical Girls can't@push around, so that I can be free to love who I want...!
—Himena—@So that no one will laugh at me when I tell them about@my relationship with Hiko, no matter what form it takes...!
I'll do whatever it takes to make that happen...

group_1.textLeft: There's a stench of filth and soap blended@together...!
Uh, um, um, would you like some spray deodorant?!

group_1.textRight: Thanks, I'll give it a try...

group_1.textLeft: So, why have you suddenly come to me?

group_1.textCenter: No, we just wanted to give Princess a break.

group_1.textRight: Yes, she's already done her best. We'll take care@of investigating tall buildings.

group_1.textLeft: 'Kay then, I'll wait here with the instructor.
"Princess," huh? *Chuckle* She's grown@somewhat fond of you, hasn't she?

group_1.textRight: Probably because I opened up to them?
Mind if I take a little nap...? My heart is worn out...

group_1.textLeft: You'll want to be careful around the men here.

group_1.textRight: That kind of flirting is totally ridiculous...
